column5: Any professional or doctor would have been able to help him explain why he is on the medication and that he's going through treatment.  Ad someone who suffers from both of the illnesses  its it's not something that is thrown around  glibly.
Cannabis induced psychosis is not schizophrenia.  Nor bipolar disorder. He said nothing about voices or hallucinations  and seemed to be just seeking attention  from  the press.
Amen I am schizophrenic and I don't attack anyone
